fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom
Class VOILUTColorModel

Object
  ColorModel
      VOIColorModel
          VOILUTColorModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transparency
public final class VOILUTColorModel
extends VOIColorModel

A 1-component color model representing a VOI LUT encoded as a true lookup table.

Constructor Detail

VOILUTColorModel

public VOILUTColorModel(int ttype,
                        int bits,
                        int first,
                        Object lut,
                        ColorSpace cs)
Constructs a new VOILUTColorModel.

Parameters:
ttype - Transfer type, one of DataBuffer.TYPE_BYTE, DataBuffer.TYPE_SHORT, and DataBuffer.TYPE_USHORT.
bits - number of significant bits (8 to 16).
first - pixel value mapped to the first entry of the LUT.
lut - the table, byte[], short[] or Number[]
cs - Color space, must have 1 component.
